tool_description: Generate random colors from a simple requests.
name: Random Color Generator
title: Random Color Generator

api_list.name: Get multiple colors at once
api_list.description: This request will be responded to by multiple colors which length should be given by parameters.

api_list.name: Get a Single Color
api_list.description: This request will be responded to by a single color in 3 formats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-color-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
